name: Arcade Runner - Make your way
description:
This is arcade runner:

Drag and throw cubes, collect coins, get to the arcade ;).

A game that needs speed. Try to get to the arcade as fast as you can while collecting as many coins as possible. 

But be AWARE, big gaps and lightning rods can only be overcome by using your psychic powers to move the blocks and freeze them in mid air.

Try your luck, beat the best players and show it on our HIGHSCORE board ;)

Music:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lt-t5Qa4o2Q&t=2097s&ab_channel=DGtv-DaemonGamingTV
